      struct Size {
    var width: Double
    var height: Double

    func area() -> Double {
      width * height
    }
  }

  let someSize = Size(width: 10.0, height: 5.5) // ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ìƒì„±
  let area = someSize.area() // 55.0 ì´ë¼ëŠ” ê°’ì´ areaì— í• ë‹¹ë¨.
